welcome_page.title: Welcome

steps.title: Start Your Design for Just $2
steps.description: Your sticker design deposit is only $2—and it's fully refundable if you're not completely satisfied!

steps.title: Approve and Customize
steps.description: After you approve your beautiful design, easily choose your sticker options:
steps.price_range: Prices range from just $2 to $7 per sticker.

steps.title: Order Exactly What You Need
steps.description: No minimum order—order one or one hundred, completely your choice!
steps.shipping_info: Free shipping on orders of 50 stickers or more.

welcome_page.process_intro: Here's the simple process to get your custom stickers:
process_steps: 1. Fill out the application and pay refundable fee
2. Then the design will be send within 24 hours with a order form
3. you fill out the order form and pay for the physical sticker and delivery fee
